gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REPORT VB

sense.def:
To estimate an amount or a quantity
pomeni približno izračunati neki znesek ali količino ali reči, kolikšna najverjetneje bo.

seg.quote: They were not able to estimate the cost.
He estimated he would do the hundred miles by noon.
In 1975 there were an estimated 6,000 children in community homes.
According to some estimates the number of farms has increased by 50 per cent.

sense.def:
An estimate
je tudi sodba o neki osebi ali razmerah.

seg.quote: Thomas wasn't living up to my estimate of him.
